overview.description: Premium skincare solution for Oily, Combination skin types.

benefits.title: Key Benefits
benefits.description: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum offers multiple benefits for your skin.

usage.title: How to Use
usage.instructions: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen
usage.tips: For best results, use consistently as part of your skincare routine.

safety.title: Safety Information
safety.precautions: Perform a patch test before first use. Discontinue if irritation occurs.

skin_type.title: Suitable For
skin_type.description: Formulated for Oily, Combination skin types.
